channel.description: Unforgettable true crime mysteries, exclusive newsmaker interviews, hard-hitting investigative reports and in-depth coverage of high profile stories. Hosted by David Muir and Amy Robach.

item.title: Girl Scout Murders
item.description: The murders of three young girls in 1977 turned an Oklahoma community upside down after the case went cold for decades. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: BONUS: Behind 'Red-Handed'
item.description: This bonus episode of 20/20, hosted by contributing anchor Deborah Roberts, features exclusive behind-the-scenes details from Josh Margolin, one of the leading reporters in this shocking murder case that rocked a small town in Arkansas to its core. When authorities find a well-known former state senator murdered outside her home in Arkansas, rumors began to fly. Who killed Linda Collins-Smith? Could she have made a fatal enemy along her meteoric rise in state politics? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
item.itunes:title: Behind 'Red-Handed'
item.itunes:author: ABC News
item.itunes:summary: This bonus episode of 20/20, hosted by contributing anchor Deborah Roberts, features exclusive behind-the-scenes details from Josh Margolin, one of the leading reporters in this shocking murder case that rocked a small town in Arkansas to its core. When authorities find a well-known former state senator murdered outside her home in Arkansas, rumors began to fly. Who killed Linda Collins-Smith? Could she have made a fatal enemy along her meteoric rise in state politics? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
item.content:encoded:
This bonus episode of 20/20, hosted by contributing anchor Deborah Roberts, features exclusive behind-the-scenes details from Josh Margolin, one of the leading reporters in this shocking murder case that rocked a small town in Arkansas to its core. 

When authorities find a well-known former state senator murdered outside her home in Arkansas, rumors began to fly. Who killed Linda Collins-Smith? Could she have made a fatal enemy along her meteoric rise in state politics? 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Last Seen in Lakeland
item.description: Amy Robach's exclusive TV interview with the husband convicted of his wife's murder - but is he imprisoned for a crime of another? Plus, an interview with the host of Lava For Good’s ‘Bone Valley’ podcast about the story: https://lavaforgood.com/bvlanding/. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: The Final Act
item.description: Daniel Wozniak was a community theater actor in California when he was arrested for the murders of Sam Herr, a war veteran, and Julie Kibuishi, a college student and dancer, in May 2010. (OAD 05/31/19; S41 E37) Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
